Fantasy 











 





Bull market
 




Kirk Hinrich, Ben Zombie can't wait to party in South Beach.  (AP)



    

    

      The defending champs can't run out of Chicago fast enough. The Bulls beat 
      the Heat 107-89 and will travel to Miami with a 2-0 series 
      lead. The Raptors also cash in at home, edging 
      the Nets 89-83 to tie the series.
    

  
 Related Links:• Suns rout Lakers by 28 | Series | Raptors: Mitchell wins COTY award• Bulls-Heat | Nets-Raptors | Experts | Playoff stats | Mejia: Blog | Tony!


 


 

 





 MLB Power Rankings: Giants heading in right direction


    

      
      Bleak -- Barry Zito gets shelled, Barry Bonds quiet and the Giants at 
      1-6. Better -- Zito is earning,  
      Bonds is bashing and young Matt Cain is raising his game, Eric 
      Mack says.
    

  
• Giants: Top L.A. for 6th straight | Fantasy:  Week


 

 





 Goldstein: Put on your thinking Cup and ponder Round 1


    

      
      What have we learned? Three R's: Red Wings, Rangers, Richard Matvichuk. 
      Specifically, Detroit isn't 'old,' NYC isn't agitated with Avery and N.J. 
      doesn't regret a big check.
    

  
• WED: NYR-BUF | VAN-ANA | THU: OTT-NJ | SJ-DET
